abstract: Google, in the role of Ernestine the Operator, plays center stage in a new cordless phone kit from General Electric.
snippet: Google, in the role of Ernestine the Operator, plays center stage in a new cordless phone kit from General Electric.
lead_paragraph: Google, in the role of Ernestine the Operator, plays center stage in a new cordless phone kit from General Electric. The Premiere DECT 6.0 28821FJ3 has a GOOG-411 button on the keypad, which lets a caller request phone numbers and addresses from Google’s extensive database without having to speak to a person.

headline.main: A Cordless Phone With a Direct Google Connection
headline.print_headline: A Cordless Phone With a Direct Google Connection
